mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRICE=#{price},NAME=#{name},STOCK=#{stock},IMG= #{img}, CATEGORY_ID = #{category_id}, SOLDAMOUNT= #{soldamount}, DESCRIPTION = #{description} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.product_id,p.name,p.price,p.stock,p.img, p.category_id,p.soldamount,p.description,c.category_name FROM product p join category c on p.category_id = c.category_id where p.name LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%' OR c.category_name LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
